achievements.name: "The Bomber Will Not Always Get Through"
achievements.desc: Destroy "Flamewind Feathers" launched by the Goldflame Qucusaur Tyrant twice during a single challenge.

achievements.name: Deep-Fried... Ice Cream?
achievements.desc: Use an exploding Flamegranate to trigger the Melt reaction on the Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King.

achievements.name: "This Flamegranate Isn't Just for Show!"
achievements.desc: Use an exploding Flamegranate to defeat the Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King.

achievements.name: "It Is Too Late for You, Inorganics."
achievements.desc: Defeat the Secret Source Automaton: Configuration Device while it is stunned.

achievements.name: Specially-Shaped Saurian...
achievements.desc: Defeat the Tenebrous Papilla while it is replicating the forms of a Primo Geovishap, a Jadeplume Terrorshroom, and the Millennial Pearl Seahorse respectively.

achievements.name: Good Thing I'm a Cut Above
achievements.desc: Destroy a total of 8 Radiant Reflections created by the Wayward Hermetic Spiritspeaker during a single challenge.

achievements.name: Die, or Go Parry II
achievements.desc: Defeat the Lord of Eroded Primal Fire when the battlefield has been reduced to its smallest size.
